title: The Cruise of the Magi
creator_credit: Shan Benson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Follows the cruise of the Co-operative Trading Society’s boat ‘The Magi’, along the coast of south east Papua among the Mailu Islands. Shows something of the boat’s trading activities and organisation of the Co-operative, the work of the Co-operative Officer employed by the government, and also aspects of native life.
